meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>machine</kanji> <kanji>alert</kanji> is an alert that is timed by a machine, not by a human. It's pretty <vocabulary>quick</vocabulary>. It's also <vocabulary>quick-witted</vocabulary>. Machines can move and think so much faster than us, after all.

機敏 is often used to describe the way someone responds <vocabulary>prompt</vocabulary>ly to various situations, and implies being highly responsive and adaptive.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
